title: Support doesn't even work
body:
bro legit requested a human. To get my account unbanned from a random player beening toxic playing my account. waited 24 hours. No reply, have to talk to a bot about something that didn't even help me at all, like come on what the fu{{item:2424}} ck riot get some actual people

 I had no knowledge of my account being accessed due to zero email notifications and year 12, while having no comp to play on.  not even a single email regarding the bad behaviour, yet they in the end blamed me for the security being my responsibility.

replies.body: Your account security is 100% your liability, and if compromised, you are meant to change the password. like i stated in the paragraph above^^(I had no knowledge of my account being accessed due to zero email notifications from Riot, not even a single email regarding the bad behavior, yet they in the end blamed me for the security being my responsibility.) I did not receive any sort of emails from "riot games" in my inbox. Spent roughly 30-40 minutes manually searching. Still confused to why i should get a permanent suspension for something that i had completely nothing to do with it.{{item:3455}}
While Therazir isn't strictly speaking wrong, that info is also a bit misleading. Follow the account recovery process with support.

Hey DELETEZOE, 

Your account security is 100% your liability, and if compromised, you are meant to change the password. 
I get the feeling you had a period of time away from league, then came back to find the account banned. (As you already stated)
The bots are there to give you an instant response (And part a quirky but funny joke), once you click " Request a Human" your meant to type in another response, to update the ticket. So maybe just say hey whats up can i get a human? 

In all honesty though, Riot will not Remove a restriction on your account unless its due to system error. And because security of your account is your responsibility it will not be removed (your restriction).

Hope I helped!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} 

Therzair
This isn't exactly true. Assuming no other extenuating circumstances, support generally can and will return an account such as this once account ownership and security are confirmed.
Can confirm i can supply all security questions or whatever is needed,.
I'm not a Rioter, you should not be providing those answers to *anyone* except player support directly.

In all my experience I've never had my account returned to me.  Granted it was different and due to my Neglectful Language tilt etc. And support could not return my original account back to me. after 3 years. 

Ofcourse since then I've been much better :)

Cheers,
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} 
Therzair

An account banned for behaviour offences is a different matter. If you the account owner were the one to take the action that resulted in the suspension of the account, then that suspension will never be removed unless it was made in error.

If your account was compromised by someone unrelated to you and you have never willingly shared your account details, and that intruder took the actions that resulted in the suspension of the account, then you have a case to have that suspension removed and the account returned to you.

The account was NOT shared with anybody. I'v taken one whole year off this game to focus on studies(which went very well thanks for asking :)) spent countless amounts of money/time into this game. And all i get told is "request a human...

Tier 1 support is designed for quick answers, and can sometimes miss the mark. Sometimes this means they will see the 3rd party activity but miss the more hidden signs of compromise.

A quick response to the ticket will push you up a tier, and you'll get a longer form response, which will most likely take you through the account recovery process. So long as there is no evidence of intentional account sharing on the account, they will usually return the account once ownership and account security are verified.
